title: for the new reworked ranked season
body:
you guys should do victorious skins for one champion in each role and if you get gold or higher in that role or multiple roles players should be able to get the victorious skins for their roles for example
victorious garen top
victorious warwick jg
victorious ahri mid
victorious jhin adc
victorious sona support
and if you have gold in multiple roles you'll get multiple victorious skin corresponding with that role 
that way we dont have to wait over 130 years to probably receive a victorious skin for your favorite champion lol  

also you guys should make mastery 8. 9. and 10 with the new season
